Topic.Title: RSS feed for this site no longer exists

Posts.EditableText: What has happened to the RSS feed for the forums? The last update was Fri 1 April 2016 (ominous due to it being April Fools Day) Any refresh just shows "This feed no longer exists."
Posts.HTML: What has happened to the RSS feed for the forums? The last update was Fri 1 April 2016 (ominous due to it being April Fools Day) Any refresh just shows "This feed no longer exists."

Posts.EditableText: It's still there - if I view the source of any page on this forum I can see the links at the top, e.g. feed.php which is up to date.
Posts.HTML: It's still there - if I view the source of any page on this forum I can see the links at the top, e.g. feed.php which is up to date.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks Alex. Something must have changed as the link I had been using (and working until last Friday) was http://www.textadventures.co.uk[color=#FF0000:37whoyfk]/forum[/color:37whoyfk]/feed.php But now this seems to have changed to http://[color=#FF0000:37whoyfk]forum.[/color:37whoyfk]textadventures.co.uk/feed.php The path[color=#FF0000:37whoyfk] /forum[/color:37whoyfk] is now part of the domain. ( I think that's what it is called) Anyway, all sorted now and working again.
Posts.HTML:
Thanks Alex.
Something must have changed as the link I had been using (and working until last Friday) was http://www.textadventures.co.uk/forum/feed.php

But now this seems to have changed to http://forum.textadventures.co.uk/feed.php

The path /forum is now part of the domain. ( I think that's what it is called)

Anyway, all sorted now and working again.
